data.message:
Its a amazing experience to be a member of fb
we meet different people of different places, dialect, different culture, different countries every day
but together we chat and interact our opinions 
share our experiences, exchange views on many subjects, pictures, videos, photos of people, places, sceneries,
flowers, animals, wonderful celebrations etc. etc. every day 
together we enjoy many things even though we don't see each other, we do not know one another
together we celebrate all festivals irrespective of caste creed religion language
together we share our personal & family celebrations wish each other greetings
its a wonderful experience to be a member of fb thank you fb there is no words to thank your services or
express our gratitude to you
with love HINA . from pakistan

replies.message: Wow HiNa!  That made our day. Thanks for sharing those beautiful words with us. We're so happy you're a part of our community. <3 -Jordan
